Equipment.name: BT_HEADSET
Equipment.description: Bluetooth headset device reworked to be used with IOCards.

Parameter.name: IOCard
Parameter.description: name of the IO_CARD used to manage headset buttons

Parameter.name: powerButton
Parameter.description: Number of the Slave IOCard's relay used to poweronoff the headset

Parameter.name: volUpButton
Parameter.description: Number of the Slave IOCard's relay from Slave IOCard used to increase volume

Parameter.name: volDownButton
Parameter.description: Number of the Slave IOCard's relay from Slave IOCard used to decrease volume

Parameter.name: callButton
Parameter.description: Number of the Slave IOCard's relay used to place a call

Parameter.name: fwdButton
Parameter.description: Number of the Slave IOCard's relay used to fwd music

Parameter.name: rwdButton
Parameter.description: Number of the Slave IOCard's relay used to rwd music

Parameter.name: playPauseButton
Parameter.description: Number of the Slave IOCard's relay used to play/pause audio

Parameter.name: defaultShortKeyPressTimer
Parameter.description: Timer for default short key press, in second

Parameter.name: defaultLongKeyPressTimer
Parameter.description: Timer for default long key press, in second

Parameter.name: betweenDoubleKeyPressTimer
Parameter.description: Timer for pause between double key press, in second

Parameter.name: pairingTimer
Parameter.description: Timer to enter in pairing mode, in second

Parameter.name: voiceDialTimer
Parameter.description: Timer to access to redial option, in second
